name: Heroku htaccess
description:
Regular expression for the 'SetEnvIf host' directive in the htaccess file on apache

Will allow you to set specific access control the domain matching the patter
content:
Regular expression for the 'SetEnvIf host' directive in the htaccess file on apache

Will allow you to set specific access control the domain matching the patter


http://www.your-domain.herokuapp.com
your-domain.herokuapp.com
https://www.your-domain.herokuapp.com
http://your-domain.herokuapp.com
author: @InTheScript
